data.name: QueryCountIncompletePartitions
QueryIsSplitRequestPending
data.value: SELECT COALESCE((SELECT TRUE FROM "dipren"."partitions" WHERE ("job_id" = @job_id) AND ("split_requester" = @requester) LIMIT 1), FALSE) AS "requests_exist";

data.name: QueryMarkJobAsCompleted
data.value: UPDATE "dipren"."jobs" SET "updated" = @timestamp, "completed" = @timestamp, "state" = @state WHERE ("id" = @id) RETURNING "id" AS "id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "batch_size" AS "batch_size", "timeout" AS "timeout", "clock_drift" AS "clock_drift", "started" AS "started", "completed" AS "completed", "state" AS "state", "error" AS "error";

data.name: QueryMarkJobAsFailed
data.value: UPDATE "dipren"."jobs" SET "updated" = @timestamp, "state" = @state, "error" = @error WHERE ("id" = @id) RETURNING "id" AS "id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "batch_size" AS "batch_size", "timeout" AS "timeout", "clock_drift" AS "clock_drift", "started" AS "started", "completed" AS "completed", "state" AS "state", "error" AS "error";

data.name: QueryMarkJobAsReady
data.value: UPDATE "dipren"."jobs" SET "updated" = @timestamp, "state" = @state WHERE ("id" = @id) RETURNING "id" AS "id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "batch_size" AS "batch_size", "timeout" AS "timeout", "clock_drift" AS "clock_drift", "started" AS "started", "completed" AS "completed", "state" AS "state", "error" AS "error";

data.name: QueryMarkJobAsStarted
data.value: UPDATE "dipren"."jobs" SET "updated" = @timestamp, "started" = @timestamp, "state" = @state WHERE ("id" = @id) RETURNING "id" AS "id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "batch_size" AS "batch_size", "timeout" AS "timeout", "clock_drift" AS "clock_drift", "started" AS "started", "completed" AS "completed", "state" AS "state", "error" AS "error";

data.name: QueryReportProgress
data.value: UPDATE "dipren"."partitions" SET "updated" = @updated, "position" = @position, "processed" = @processed, "remaining" = @remaining, "throughput" = @throughput, "is_completed" = @completed, "split_requester" = CASE WHEN @completed = TRUE THEN NULL ELSE "split_requester" END WHERE ("id" = @id) AND ("owner" = @owner) RETURNING "id" AS "id", "job_id" AS "job_id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "owner" AS "owner", "first" AS "first", "last" AS "last", "is_inclusive" AS "is_inclusive", "position" AS "position", "processed" AS "processed", "remaining" AS "remaining", "throughput" AS "throughput", "is_completed" AS "is_completed", "split_requester" AS "split_requester";

data.name: QueryRetrieveJobById
data.value: SELECT "id" AS "id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "batch_size" AS "batch_size", "timeout" AS "timeout", "clock_drift" AS "clock_drift", "started" AS "started", "completed" AS "completed", "state" AS "state", "error" AS "error" FROM "dipren"."jobs" WHERE ("id" = @id);

data.name: QueryRetrieveJobStatusReport
data.value: SELECT t1."id" AS "id", t1."created" AS "created", t1."updated" AS "updated", t1."batch_size" AS "batch_size", t1."timeout" AS "timeout", t1."clock_drift" AS "clock_drift", t1."started" AS "started", t1."completed" AS "completed", t1."state" AS "state", t1."error" AS "error", COUNT(1) FILTER (WHERE (t2."is_completed" = FALSE) AND (t2."owner" IS NULL) AND (t2."processed" = 0)) AS "partitons_untouched", COUNT(1) FILTER (WHERE (t2."is_completed" = FALSE) AND ((t2."owner" IS NOT NULL) OR (t2."processed" > 0))) AS "partitons_in_progress", COUNT(1) FILTER (WHERE t2."is_completed" = TRUE) AS "partitions_completed", SUM(t2."remaining") AS "keys_remaining", SUM(t2."processed") AS "keys_completed", COALESCE(MAX(t2."updated"), t1."updated") AS "last_activity", COALESCE((SELECT SUM("acquired") - COUNT(1) FROM "dipren"."partitions" WHERE ("job_id" = t1."id") AND ("acquired" > 0)), 0) AS "ownership_changes", COUNT(1) FILTER (WHERE (t1."state" = 'processing') AND (t2."is_completed" = FALSE) AND (t2."split_requester" IS NOT NULL)) AS "split_requests_pending", COALESCE(SUM("throughput") FILTER (WHERE (t1."state" = 'processing') AND (t2."is_completed" = FALSE) AND (t2."updated" >= (@timestamp - ('1 MICROSECOND'::INTERVAL * ((t1."timeout" + t1."clock_drift")::DOUBLE PRECISION / 10))))), 0.0) AS "current_throughput" FROM "dipren"."jobs" t1 LEFT JOIN "dipren"."partitions" t2 ON (t1."id" = t2."job_id") WHERE (t1."id" = @id) GROUP BY t1."id", t1."created", t1."updated", t1."batch_size", t1."timeout", t1."clock_drift", t1."started", t1."completed", t1."state", t1."error";

data.name: QueryRetrievePartitionById
data.value: SELECT "id" AS "id", "job_id" AS "job_id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "owner" AS "owner", "first" AS "first", "last" AS "last", "is_inclusive" AS "is_inclusive", "position" AS "position", "processed" AS "processed", "remaining" AS "remaining", "throughput" AS "throughput", "is_completed" AS "is_completed", "split_requester" AS "split_requester" FROM "dipren"."partitions" WHERE ("id" = @id);

data.name: QueryTryAcquirePartition
data.value:
SELECT 1 FROM "dipren"."jobs" WHERE ("id" = @job_id);
WITH "candidate" AS ( SELECT "id" FROM "dipren"."partitions" WHERE ("job_id" = @job_id) AND (("owner" IS NULL) OR ("updated" < @active)) AND ("is_completed" = FALSE) ORDER BY "remaining" DESC LIMIT 1 FOR UPDATE ) UPDATE "dipren"."partitions" AS "target" SET "updated" = @updated, "owner" = @owner, "acquired" = ("acquired" + 1) FROM "candidate" WHERE ("target"."id" = "candidate"."id") RETURNING "target"."id" AS "id", "job_id" AS "job_id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "owner" AS "owner", "first" AS "first", "last" AS "last", "is_inclusive" AS "is_inclusive", "position" AS "position", "processed" AS "processed", "remaining" AS "remaining", "throughput" AS "throughput", "is_completed" AS "is_completed", "split_requester" AS "split_requester";

data.name: QueryTryRequestSplit
data.value: WITH "candidate" AS ( SELECT "id" FROM "dipren"."partitions" WHERE ("job_id" = @job_id) AND ("owner" IS NOT NULL) AND ("updated" >= @active) AND ("is_completed" = FALSE) AND ("split_requester" IS NULL) ORDER BY "remaining" DESC LIMIT 1 FOR UPDATE ) UPDATE "dipren"."partitions" AS "target" SET "split_requester" = @requester FROM "candidate" WHERE ("target"."id" = "candidate"."id");
